comments:
The following NPE is being thrown when the project tag from the the .modulemap
file for a module is deleted. Removing the project tag should create an error
condition by the EAR validator and put out an error message in the problems view

org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.commonarchivecore.internal.exception.ArchiveRuntimeE
xception: Unable to get files, modules, or utility JARs in the EAR.  Check log
files.
